source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Hood of Hungering Darkness

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

effects.display_string: Set: Your damaging spells have a chance to hit a Jackpot!, launching a Shattering Star at 3 nearby enemies at 100% effectiveness. Casting Dragonrage always hits a Jackpot!
Set: Casting Shattering Star or hitting a Jackpot! increases the damage of your next empower spell by 25%, stacking up to 2 times.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Rippers of the Destroyer

spells.description: Use: Deal yourself in, granting you 8,569 to 10,473 Mastery for 15 sec and stacking the deck. Stacking the deck increases the minimum Mastery on future hands by 317 until you leave combat, up to 3 times. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Equip: Your spells have a chance to imbue the wax, causing it to form into a blazing candle for 15 sec which increases your Versatility by 3,718, further increased by 977 while you remain within its light.
Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Wings of Shattered Sorrow

name: Blastfurious Machete
description: The word 'Family' is etched into its hilt.

spells.description:
Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
Equip: You champion the causes of your guild.  All guild reputation gains are increased by 100%.
